messageBody:
I guess I want to be able to apply my filter and yet not run from
the main but using the RunWith option. Is the answer to this a
customized runner where my filter is applied?

Can anyone help me out please?

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "adass75" <adass75@...> wrote:
>
> I have the following class that filters request to run only those
> methods in Trial.class with a "SRG" prefix.
>
> @RunWith(Suite.class)
> @...({
> Trial.class
> })
> public class SRGSuite {
> public static void main(String argv[]) {
> JUnitCore jCore = new JUnitCore();
> Request req = Request.classes("SESSuite",SRGSuite.class);
> jCore.run(req.filterWith(new TestFilter("SRG")));
> }
> }
>
> This works fine if I run the class directly. However, when I run
it
> from ANT1.7, it runs all the methods in Trial class and not just
the
> prefixed ones.
>
> I understand that ANT isn't calling my main method, but then how
do
> I use my filter when running from ANT1.7?
>
> I'm new to junit, pls do point out if I have missed out anything
> basic.
>
